articles.author: Corpus Christi (Texas) Caller-Times, Corpus Christi (Texas) Caller-Times
articles.title: Child with cerebral palsy facing immigration detention after surgery
articles.description: Rosamaria Hernandez came under threat of deportation after crossing a Customs and Border Protection checkpoint to get to Corpus Christi for the surgery.

articles.title: The U.S. nursed an undocumented 10-year-old. Now it may deport her.
articles.description: One of the newest arrivals this week at the Baptist Children's Home Ministries facility for child migrants in San Antonio, Tex., is 10 years...

articles.title: Border congressman among highest funded by group running immigrant facilities
articles.description: U.S. Rep. Henry Cuellar, D-Laredo, has received $32,400 in political contributions from a company that operates immigrant detention centers — the second most of any elected official in the country this election cycle.

articles.author: LORENZO ZAZUETA-CASTRO | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Advocates, lawmakers demand Trump switch course on child separations
articles.description: BROWNSVILLE — How does love demand us to act?
